body_html: Would the better thing to have done to modify https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl#L957 to add the tf_custom_op_library_additional_deps, instead of adding it to the leaf target here?

body: Would the better thing to have done to modify https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl#L957 to add the tf_custom_op_library_additional_deps, instead of adding it to the leaf target here?
